import React,{useState} from "react"; import { add_restaurant,alertConfirm,alertSuccess,alertError } from "../utils/functions"; import {withRouter} from 'react-router-dom'; const AddRestaurant = ({history}) => { const [grade,setGrade] = useState (""); const [date,setDate] = useState (""); const [score,setScore] = useState (0); const [grades,setGrades] = useState ([]); const [name,setName] = useState (""); const [cuisine,setCuisine] = useState (""); const [borough,setBorough] = useState (""); const [lat,setLat] = useState (0); const [lon,setLon] = useState (0); const [street,setStreet] = useState (""); const [zipcode,setZipcode] = useState (""); const [building,setBuilding] = useState (""); const addGrade = () =>{ const item = { grade, date, score }; setGrades(grades.concat(item)); } const add = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); alertConfirm () .then ((res=>{ if (res.value){ let data = { name, borough, cuisine, grades, address:{ building, street, zipcode, coord:[lon,lat] } } add_restaurant (data) .then (res=>{ alertSuccess().then(()=>history.push('/')) return; }) .catch (err=>{ alertError(); return; }) }else{ return; } })) } const body = { width: "100%", backgroundPosition: "center", backgroundSize: "cover", position: "absolute", minHeight: "100%", overflowY: "hidden", overflowX: "hidden", }; return (

AGREGAR SUPERHEROE

{/*
*/}

{name}

setName(e.target.value)} />
setCharacter(e.target.value)}*/ />
); }; export default withRouter (AddRestaurant); {/*

Agregar restaurante

setName(e.target.value)} required/>
setCuisine(e.target.value)} required/>
setBorough(e.target.value)} required/>

Dirección

setLat(e.target.value)} required/> setLon(e.target.value)} required/>
setStreet(e.target.value)} required/>
setZipcode(e.target.value)} required/>
setBuilding(e.target.value)}/>

Opiniones

setGrade(e.target.value)}/> setScore(e.target.value)}/> setDate(e.target.value)}/>
{grades.map((item)=>( ))}
Grado Puntuación Fecha
{item.grade} {item.score} {item.date}

(*) Campos obligatorios

*/}
